text: Cheyenne Autumn is a 1964 American epic western movie directed by John Ford and starring Richard Widmark, Carroll Baker, James Stewart, Edward G. Robinson. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for an Academy Awards in 1965. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:1964 movies Category:1960s epic movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:English-language movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:American epic movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford Category:Movies set in Utah Category:Movies set in the 19th century
title: Cheyenne Autumn
